summary: This is an internal email forwarding an invitation from the FBI Victim Services Division to victims of Jeffrey Epstein, inviting them to attend informational briefings in New York or Florida in October 2019 regarding available victim services. The email chain shows coordination among victim services personnel and attorneys.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the perpetrator whose victims are being invited to the FBI Victim Services Division briefing.

events.title: FBI Victim Services Briefing (New York)
events.description: A meeting for victims of Jeffrey Epstein with FBI Victim Services representatives, FBI NY Field Office, and the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to learn about available victim services.

events.title: FBI Victim Services Briefing (Florida)
events.description: A meeting for victims of Jeffrey Epstein with FBI Victim Services representatives, FBI NY Field Office, and the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to learn about available victim services.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was actively reaching out to victims of Jeffrey Epstein in September 2019 to offer support services.
Two informational briefings were scheduled for victims in October 2019, one in New York and one in Florida.
The invitation indicates an active investigation was ongoing, though specific details would not be shared at the briefing.
Victims were allowed to bring one support person to the meeting.
The document references an FBI case number: NY-3027571.
